about_the_game:
A story based, puzzle game, Monsty Corp will have you exploring the facility known as “Monsty Corp”, an advanced science facility closed down due to strange occurrences.

It's a race against time to save yourself and possibly the world from an evil AI named SAIC (Sentient Artificial and Intelligent Consciousness). Will you stop it? Or will it keep you captive forever, o-

Hello? Is this coming through? I messed up and I need your help... I do- I don't know where I am. If you see this pleas-

nly time will tell.

Play as Robin and uncover the secrets of Monsty Corp

After getting stuck within the Monsty Corp facility, Robin just wants to go home and see their husband.

Play as Alex and uncover the mystery behind your partners disappearance

Five years ago Robin went missing. And for 5 years Alex has been looking for clues to his partners disappearance.

Features

  • Multiple Endings
  • 3D Puzzle Game
  • Various twists and turns to keep you on the edge of your seat

content_descriptors.notes:
Monsty Corp contains violence, course language, small amounts of gore, references to suicide and killing/murder.

This game is not recommended for children or individuals sensitive to the aforementioned content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: The System Requirements are based on the requirements for Unreal Engine 5. We do not have the capabilities to run the game using less specifications.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: The System Requirements are based on the requirements for Unreal Engine 5. We do not have the capabilities to run the game using less specifications.
